DataSource.Query: WITH summary AS ( SELECT inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.store_id, inventory.get_store_name_by_store_id(inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.store_id) AS store_name, inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.item_id, inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.base_unit_id, SUM(CASE WHEN inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.transaction_type = 'Dr' THEN inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.base_quantity ELSE inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.base_quantity * -1 END) AS base_total_quantity FROM inventory.verified_checkout_details_view WHERE store_id = @StoreId OR 0 = @StoreId::integer AND value_date <= @Date::date GROUP BY inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.store_id, inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.item_id, inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.base_unit_id ) SELECT store_id, store_name, item_id, inventory.get_item_code_by_item_id(item_id) AS item_code, inventory.get_item_name_by_item_id(item_id) AS item_name, inventory.convert_unit(base_unit_id, inventory.get_root_unit_id(base_unit_id)) * base_total_quantity AS quantity, inventory.get_unit_name_by_unit_id(inventory.get_root_unit_id(base_unit_id)) AS unit FROM summary ORDER BY store_id, item_id;
